movies.title: Den svaga punkten
movies.plot: A horse breeder is found dead, and almost everything proves that he is been kicked by his horse. But the post-mortem shows the opposite, the horse breeder had been hit to death and that is a case for Kurt Wallander. The neighbors confirms that he lived alone, but he had visits from a mysterious woman several times. An amazing thing on the farm shows a hole new side of the horse feeder and somewhere, in the beautiful state of Skåne, there's a dark world that didn't want to see the daylight.
movies.simplePlot: A horse breeder is found dead, and almost everything proves that he is been kicked by his horse. But the post-mortem shows the opposite, the horse breeder had been hit to death and that is ...

biography.bio: Krister Henriksson was born on November 12, 1946 in Häverö, Stockholms län, Sweden as Jan Krister Allan Henriksson. He is an actor and director, known for Wallander: enquêtes criminelles (2005), Reconstruction (2003) and Infidèle (2000). He has been married to Cecilia Nilsson since 1988. They have one child.
biography.name: Krister Henriksson

biography.bio: Johanna Sällström was born on December 30, 1974 in Stockholm, Sweden. In 1997 she won the award Guldbaggen for best female leading role in the movie Beneath the Surface (1997), which became her big breakthrough. Getting tired off all the interest around herself she moved to Denmark where she worked at a café shop, but in year 2000 she went back to Sweden and continued her acting career. She was best known for playing the police agent Linda Wallander in Wallander: enquêtes criminelles (2005). Even though Johanna Sällström often played tough on the screen, it is said she was much more shy and quiet in her private life. Sällström was found dead by the police at her home in Malmö, Sweden on 13th of February 2007.
biography.name: Johanna Sällström

biography.bio: Ola Rapace was born on December 3, 1971 in Tyresö, Stockholms län, Sweden as Pär Ola Norell. He is an actor and producer, known for Skyfall (2012), Beyond (2010) and Together (2000). He was previously married to Noomi Rapace.
biography.name: Ola Rapace

biography.bio: Angela Kovacs was born on May 23, 1964 in Vaksala, Uppland, Sweden. She is an actress, known for Irene Huss - Den krossade tanghästen (2008), Irene Huss (2007) and Irene Huss - Guldkalven (2008).
biography.name: Angela Kovacs

biography.bio: Fredrik Gunnarsson was born on September 4, 1965 in Oxelösund, Östergötlands län, Sweden. He is an actor, known for Wallander: enquêtes criminelles (2005), Show Me Love (1998) and Lycka till och ta hand om varandra (2012).
biography.name: Fredrik Gunnarsson

biography.bio: Mats Bergman was born on May 5, 1948 in Gothenburg, Västra Götalands län, Sweden. He is an actor, known for Wallander: enquêtes criminelles (2005), Evil (2003) and Den ofrivillige golfaren (1991).
biography.name: Mats Bergman

biography.bio: Marianne Mörck was born on September 2, 1949 in Sweden. She is an actress and director, known for Wallander: enquêtes criminelles (2005), Credo (1997) and Hon jazzade en sommar (2003).
biography.name: Marianne Mörck

biography.bio: Stina Ekblad was born on February 26, 1954 in Solf, Finland. She is an actress, known for Love Is All You Need (2012), Hjälp! (2007) and Une solution rationnelle (2009).
biography.name: Stina Ekblad

biography.bio: Katrin Sundberg was born on October 8, 1962 in Örebro, Örebro län, Sweden. She is known for her work on Adam & Eva (1997), Wonderful and Loved by All (2007) and Superhjältejul (2009).
biography.name: Katrin Sundberg

biography.bio: Ylva Lööf was born on February 28, 1958 in Sollebrunn, Västergötland, Sweden. She is an actress, known for As It Is in Heaven (2004), The Girl Who Kicked the Hornet's Nest (2009) and Tjuvjägaren (2016).
biography.name: Ylva Lööf

biography.bio: Cecilia Nilsson was born on July 15, 1957 in Stockholm, Sweden. She is an actress, known for A Summer Tale (2000), Simon & the Oaks (2011) and Lilla Jönssonligan och cornflakeskuppen (1996). She has been married to Krister Henriksson since 1988. They have one child.
biography.name: Cecilia Nilsson

biography.bio: Magnus Mark was born on November 26, 1964 in Själevad, Sweden as Bo Magnus Mark. He is an actor, known for Tre kronor (1994), Four Shades of Brown (2004) and Whaled Women (2013).
biography.name: Magnus Mark

biography.bio: Andrea Edwards was born on September 28, 1966. She is an actress, known for Braquage à la suédoise (2015), Easy Money (2010) and Gunnar Govin - en man, en röst, en resa (2003).
biography.name: Andrea Edwards

biography.bio: Lotta Tejle was born on March 17, 1960 in Västervik, Småland, Sweden as Karin Charlotta Tejle. She is an actress, known for Barna Hedenhös uppfinner julen (2013), Metal Brothers (2012) and Slim Susie (2003).
biography.name: Lotta Tejle

biography.bio: Jacob Nordenson was born on September 2, 1952 in Stockholm, Stockholms län, Sweden as Vilhelm Nordenson. He is known for his work on The Girl Who Kicked the Hornet's Nest (2009), Tic Tac (1997) and Seeds of the Fall (2009).
biography.name: Jacob Nordenson
